titleStmt.title: The second part of The rover as it is acted by the servants of His Royal Highness / written by A. Behn.
Rover. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Killigrew, Thomas, 1612-1683. Thomaso.

notesStmt.note: "The success of the 1st part induced Mrs. Behn to write the 2d part - she had again recourse to Killegrew, but she now could pillage only thos scenes ... which in the first instance she had properly rejected" - Genest. Acct. of Eng. stage
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
